articles.title: USWNT favourites to win 2023 World Cup, according to tournament simulation - The Athletic
articles.description:
The USWNT are the favourites to win the 2023 Women’s World Cup according to forecasting technology by Nielsen’s Gracenote Data Analysis.

articles.title: Microsoft and Sony sign deal to keep Call of Duty on PlayStation consoles - TechCrunch
articles.description: Microsoft and Sony signed an agreement to keep Call of Duty games to PlayStation consoles. Microsoft only mentions Call of Duty titles as part of this deal.
articles.content: Microsoft and Sony signed an agreement to keep Call of Duty games on PlayStation consoles. As a reminder, Microsoft offered to acquire Activision Blizzard for $69 billion. And yet, 18 months after th… [+2528 chars]
